channel.title: Overseer releases
channel.description: The latest version of jOverseer, the Middle-Earth game helper program.

item.description:
VERSION 1.0.11 --------------
* Updater o The Updater now spots windows and tries to run with elevated privileges if needed. o Added jOverseer.exe to launch jOverseer with the right java options and remove the dos window. o Running jOverseerUpdater.exe will always download the latest version.
* Econo Calc o The economic calculator now correctly reports that "Your taxes will go up *by* n% to m%"
* Current Hex View o Show Army movement is now a toggle. Click it again to remove the displayed range. o Show Character Movement Range is now a toggle. o The icon/button to display orders no longer jumps left/right when used.
* Other o The Blue Wizard now appears in the Kinstrife characters.
